column3: 2015 peter daniel rodriguez passed away at the age of 38 in houston
column5: 2015. peter was born in jefferson city missouri on december 23
column6: 1976. peter is survived by his loving wife erika torrez. the family will be accepting visitors for a memorial service on sunday june 14
